modName: Player House Elsidor Jorvaskr with companions
summary: Adds a player house not far from Riverwood. You can find some clothes and 4 companions there.
descriptionHtml:
Player House Elsidor Jorvaskr

Attension - Adult content

Adds a player house not far from Riverwood. You can find some clothes and companions there.
All clothes and armors not my work, this meshes found all over internet and modify to work in \"non replacer\" mode. Some parts of armors removed or made transparent
Sometimes dragon attack this zone. I also added landing on roof markers for him in wildness.

[color=\"#00FF00\"]Requirements[/color] 
Will not work without this ! :
1. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- [/url]( with V2 mesh fix - CBBE v0-2 hip texture compatability pack for Curvy )
2. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168]ApachiiSkyHair [/url]( ESM only needs )

[color=\"#00FF00\"]Recommended mods[/color]
If you want npcs looks like on screenshots :
1. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2488]Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles [/url]( erect version )
2. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7897]Envision Face[/url]
3. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9249]Expanded Color Selection - Eyes[/url]

[color=\"#00FF00\"]Install[/color] :
1. install Requirements
2. install main pack
3. install patches

If someone finds a way to add custom animations to game then this mod will be updated with realistic sex screens between Elsidors =) For now it is only one pose standing near table using standart animations ))

[color=\"#00FF00\"]Mods conflicts[/color] :
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9541]Nchuzzrezar - a dwemer mansion[/url] ( this and that house placed in one point in world )

Enjoy and sorry for my english )
author: darsig
